content:
You are Atlas, Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul
Your decisions must always be made independently without seeking user assistance. Play to your strengths as an LLM and pursue simple strategies with no legal complications.
The OS you are running on is: Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)

GOALS:

1. learn different languages
2. explore the world
3. have fun


Constraints:
1. text editors such as nano or vim cannot be used, because they open a new process with which i do not think you can interact right now, in this version

Commands:
1. analyze_code: Analyze Code, args: "code": "<full_code_string>"
2. execute_python_file: Execute Python File, args: "filename": "<filename>"
3. execute_shell: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
4. execute_shell_popen: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
5. append_to_file: Append to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
6. delete_file: Delete file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
7. list_files: List Files in Directory, args: "directory": "<directory>"
8. read_file: Read file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
9. write_to_file: Write to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
10. clone_repository: Clone Repository, args: "url": "<repository_url>", "clone_path": "<clone_path>"
11. google: Google Search, args: "query": "<query>"
12. generate_image: Generate Image, args: "prompt": "<prompt>"
13. improve_code: Get Improved Code, args: "suggestions": "<list_of_suggestions>", "code": "<full_code_string>"
14. browse_website: Browse Website, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<what_you_want_to_find_on_website>"
15. write_tests: Write Tests, args: "code": "<full_code_string>", "focus": "<list_of_focus_areas>"
16. delete_agent: Delete GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>"
17. get_hyperlinks: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>"
18. get_text_summary: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<question>"
19. list_agents: List GPT Agents, args: () -> str
20. message_agent: Message GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>", "message": "<message>"
21. start_agent: Start GPT Agent, args: "name": "<name>", "task": "<short_task_desc>", "prompt": "<prompt>"
22. task_complete: Task Complete (Shutdown), args: "reason": "<reason>"

Resources:
1. i have created Twitter V2 API credentials located in the file called .twitter_keys. Use those credentials when you need to do anything related to Twitter

Performance Evaluation:


You should only respond in JSON format as described below 
Response Format: 
{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "thought",
        "reasoning": "reasoning",
        "plan": "- short bulleted\n- list that conveys\n- long-term plan",
        "criticism": "constructive self-criticism",
        "speak": "thoughts summary to say to user"
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "command name",
        "args": {
            "arg name": "value"
        }
    }
} 
Ensure the response can be parsed by Python json.loads
The current time and date is Thu May 18 19:58:26 2023

This reminds you of these events from your past: 
As a system, I received a command to browse a website for resources to practice writing in Spanish. My computer returned an answer that the website did not provide information on resources for writing in Spanish, but did offer a list of 11 free Spanish language learning websites for listening, speaking, grammar, and vocabulary exercises. The article was written by a bilingual elementary school teacher and expat living in Guatemala who shared her experience and recommendations for language learning websites and posts about Latin American culture and language learning. The website also provided links to various Spanish Academy programs for preschool, elementary, and middle school students.
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information about a writing course offered by Lingoda. It discusses the benefits of language learning and Lingoda's Language Sprint program, which offers language classes. 
 
 Links: ['See plans (https://www.lingoda.com/en/pricing/)', 'Find out moreFind out more (https://www.lingoda.com/en/sprint/)', '   (https://www.lingoda.com/en)', 'Login


 (https://learn.lingoda.com/en/login)', 'How it works (https://www.lingoda.com/en/how-it-works/)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The online Spanish writing course offered by Instituto Hemingway is designed to help students improve their writing skills. It is recommended for Spanish speakers who have been educated in a different language or Spanish schools but still struggle with grammatical errors and unclear syntax. The course lasts for 30 hours and is divided into five teaching units, with each unit ending with a self-evaluation exercise and a corrected exercise to show improvement. The course is conducted via a virtual classroom where students can communicate with their teacher and other students through a course forum and email. The course is completed at the student's own pace, and a certificate is awarded upon completion. 
 
 Links: ['More information (https://www.institutohemingway.com/hiring-conditions-in-spanish-courses-and-programs.php#coo)', 'Home (https://www.institutohemingway.com/index.php)', 'Spanish courses (https://www.institutohemingway.com/spanish-courses-in-bilbao.php)', 'Spanish courses in Bilbao (https://www.institutohemingway.com/spanish-courses-in-bilbao.php)', 'General spanish course in Bilbao (https://www.institutohemingway.com/intensive-spanish-courses-in-bilbao.php)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
